name: Ginga and Fluidity
description: Develop the foundational movement of Capoeira, the Ginga, which allows fluid transitions between attacks and defenses.

cards.title: Basic Ginga Movement
cards.description: A fundamental side-to-side rocking motion used to maintain fluidity and readiness.
bulletpoints: Keep knees slightly bent for mobility
Maintain a constant rhythm to the music
cards.summaryText: Rock through the ginga with soft knees, swinging arms, and steady rhythm to stay ready.

cards.title: Advanced Ginga Variations
cards.description: Enhance the Ginga by integrating directional shifts and feints.
bulletpoints: Use feints to mislead your opponent
Keep your center of gravity low for better stability
cards.summaryText: Layer feints and low center control into your ginga so every transition stays smooth and deceptive.
